unit.utterance_translation: And (he) came and said, "Hey, what are you doing?"

unit.utterance: "Ahiki, enam na hio koa nom, nam na tara nom a tahii,
unit.utterance_translation: "Nothing, we are just sitting here, we are looking at the sea,

unit.utterance_translation: we - we don't know (how) to get anything from the sea."

unit.utterance: "Ahiki, enam na toku koa nom a tabae toro gono ni nam."
unit.utterance_translation: "No, we just don't know what we must use to get (it)."

unit.utterance: Naa pasi vaasusu ameam tea paku kave."
unit.utterance_translation: I'll teach you how to make nets."
